title: AI-Assisted Cataloging Pipelines for Academic Libraries
abstract: A framework for combining machine learning with MARC21 validation to improve cataloging accuracy at scale.

title: Designing Knowledge Governance for Hybrid Repositories
abstract: A governance model integrating digital preservation, access policy, and stakeholder alignment.

title: Measuring Research Impact Through Digital Repository Analytics
abstract: Evaluation of analytics dashboards that connect repository usage with institutional KPIs.
